about_the_game:
Welcome to Bravo Motel, where one cleaning shift unleashes a nightmare told through two perspectives. Begin as Allison, a woman seeking refuge from her past, only to find yourself entangled in the motel's sinister web. Then step into Emma's shoes, where what seemed like a desperate bid for safety becomes a horrifying revelation. As you experience the same events through different eyes, the true nature of Bravo Motel's terror begins to surface, challenging everything you thought you knew.

🎭 DUAL PERSPECTIVE NARRATIVE

  • Experience the story through two intertwined characters

  • Uncover shocking revelations as perspectives shift

  • Watch as two timelines collide to reveal the haunting truth

🧹 IMMERSIVE CLEANING SIMULATOR

  • Fully interactive environment with realistic physics

  • Detailed cleaning animations that make every task satisfying

  • Master the art of housekeeping while uncovering clues

🔍 MIND-BENDING MYSTERY

  • Piece together a narrative that challenges perception

  • See how one event can have two terrifying interpretations

  • Unravel the truth behind Bravo Motel's sinister facade

👻 PSYCHOLOGICAL HORROR

  • Photorealistic graphics that blur the line between game and reality

  • Atmospheric tension that builds with each discovered secret

  • Environmental storytelling that keeps you questioning reality

🎮 Join Our Community Discord! 🌟

Experiencing issues in the game? Need support or want to provide feedback? Our Discord is the place to be!

🚨 Instant Support Guaranteed 🚨

  • Report bugs directly to the developers

  • Get real-time updates and patches

  • Connect with other players

  • Immediate attention to your concerns

name: OutRUN Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.2 GHz, AMD Phenom II X4 955 - 4 Core, 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 280 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 /10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

short_description: After leaving her relationship, Allison stays at a motel where nothing quite makes sense. Later, play as Emma on her night shift - where the story begins. Through Emma's eyes, you'll finally understand the confusing moments from Allison's stay. Enter the mystery - each twist darker than the last.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
